name: Isaac

aboutpara: Hello, my name is Isaac Shaker. I am a second-year student studying Computer Engineering at the University of Pittsburgh. I value challenging myself and continously working towards learning new skills, especially from others. I love solving problems and creating innovative solutions. My skills include Python, JavaScript, React, Next.js., C/C++, and Arm Assembly. In my free time, I love taking long walks and working out.

I am currently seeking full-time opportunities as a software engineer.
